Business Travel¶

Plausible Attributes¶

fieldunit of
measure		notes
Business Travel Accommodation Type Code nominal numberVis-à-vis a business travel accommodation type table, which includes a unique identification code for each. Example:
{0: hotel, 1: bed & breakfast, ⋯}
Start Date dateThe check-in date.
End Date dateThe check-out date.
Latitude degree
Longitude degree

The unit of measure of the \(CO_{2}\) emission factor, for travel accommodation, is kg \(CO_{2}\)e (kilogrammes in equivalent carbon dioxide) per room per night. Therefore, the number of nights must be determinable via the data. In this case

number of nights \(=\) end date - start date
